resources.string:
Features:

- Retrieve posts from a wordpress website.

- Check every day for new posts and notify the user.

- Works in offline mode : posts stored in local database.

- Swipe down to refresh the list.

API and libraries:

- SyncAdapter is used to retrieve the new posts.

- Volley and Gson libraries are used to query the json feed of wordpress.

- ContentProvider/CursorLoader/LoaderManager are used to load the posts from the database.

- ActionBar-PullToRefresh library to refresh the list by swiping down.

- Crouton library to display errors.
